mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( name, password, bindStatus, deleteStatus, usableStatus, Administrator ) VALUES ( #{account.name}, #{account.password}, '0', '0', '0', #{account.Administrator} );
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET deleteStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, password, Administrator FROM account WHERE NAME LIKE #{name} and PASSWORD LIKE #{password} and bindStatus = 0 and deleteStatus = 0 and usableStatus = 0
SELECT id, NAME, PASSWORD, Administrator FROM account WHERE bindStatus = 0 AND deleteStatus = 0 AND usableStatus = 0
SELECT id,name,password, Administrator FROM account WHERE bindStatus = 0 AND deleteStatus = 0 AND usableStatus = 0 LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
